backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing authorization, user profiles, clients, and basic CRUD operations with sorting utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding empty documents map and initializing nextDocumentId.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files, components, and tests involved in implementing documents module and offline sync.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including routing, hooks, UI components, and documents-related code.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes with shared component styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app entry configuring TanStack Router, authentication gates, layout, and routes including DocumentsPage.
frontend/src/components/accounts/DailyEn: Form dialog for adding income or expense entries with validation, input fields, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/assets/AssetForm: Form dialog for creating an asset with validation and submission via useAddAsset.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with a login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting user to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Form dialog for adding a new client with basic validation and submission via useAddClient.
frontend/src/components/documents/Docume: Displays online/offline sync status, pending/failed operations, and retry controls.
Table listing documents with download/delete actions and formatting for dates and sizes.
Card for uploading PDF/Word/Excel files with validation, progress tracking, and metadata submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header navigation, user info, login button, and footer, highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderForm: Implements an order creation dialog with validation, form fields, and submission using the addOrder mutation.
frontend/src/components/settings/Allowli: Provides a UI to assign user roles by principal ID with confirmation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthorization.ts: Fetches and exposes user role, profile, and admin status using the actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentsOfflineQu: Manages an offline queue for document upload and delete operations with persistence and status control.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and exposing login and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks and returns the browser's online/offline status using event listeners.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on clients, orders, daily entries, and assets using an actor-based backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountsPage.tsx: Displays daily income and expense entries with filtering and a form to add new entries.
frontend/src/pages/AssetsPage.tsx: Shows a list of assets and allows adding new assets via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed client info and their orders with filtering and the ability to add new orders.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists all clients with search and navigation to detail pages, plus a form to add clients.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays financial KPIs by calculating daily, monthly, and total income/expenses and rendering cards with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Manages documents with online/offline sync, cached display, and queued upload/delete operations.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shows user profile info and admin-only allowlist management along with app details.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides helpers for detecting today/current month and formatting timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/documentsCache.ts: Stores and retrieves document metadata in localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL/session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for an internal Flutter-based Android business management app and lists architecture notes, features, and issues. Serves as a versioned snapshot describing implemented modules and planned behavior.
